agency: Los Angeles City Board of Public Works
explanation: Oversees all construction for city of LA. Includes but not limited to permits, budgets, and vendors used.
frequency: Twice a week, usually Wednesdays and Fridays 10am PST

agency: California State Board of General Contractors
explanation: Enforces penalties against all general contractor licenses for the entire state of California, including revoking licenses and fines.

agency: California State Board of Professional Engineers
explanation: Enforces penalties against all engineers who sign off on permits and construction plans for the entire state of California, including revoking licenses and fines.
frequency: Once every other month, exact date and details announced 10 days in advance

explanation: Enforces penalties against lawyer misconduct and revokes license.
frequency: Usually daily, every week, various committees

agency: Norhteast Hollywood Neighborhood Council Board Meeting
explanation: All things related to Northeast Hollywood

frequency: First and Third Tuesday Every Month at 9am, in person only but can listen live or submit written comment via email no later than 24 hours beforehand via email LAFDFireCommission@lacity.org

explanation: All things Water and Power for city of LA
once a month, second Thursday of the month
